Dead by Daylight is one of my favourite games. It's always exciting to see new survivors and killers introduced into the game. This game can be somewhat buggy but I believe that patience is definitely a virtue. Training yourself and maxing out your prestige on each character you unlock is a very exciting task and the feeling you get when completed is amazing. Survivor can be hard to begin with but if you train yourself and (if you can) get an experienced player to help you learn it can become quite as fun as killer can be. Being the killer can be a difficult in some games (as can survivor) but as I said before, training yourself is very important in this game. Other survivors could have more experience than you and it can be a challenge to beat them but in that case you observe and adapt to the way they play the game and mindgame them (mindgaming is also very important to achieve victory) to eventually downing and hooking them. Dead by Daylight is truly and extraordinary experience and I do not regret purchasing this at all. For all the people looking to buy this game I strongly recommend you do. Have fun in the fog everyone! 

(I wasn't payed to write this, although I wish I was lol)

yeah .....
Connection terminated. I'm sorry to interrupt you, Elizabeth, if you still even remember that name, But I'm afraid you've been misinformed. You are not here to receive a gift, nor have you been called here by the individual you assume, although, you have indeed been called. You have all been called here, into a labyrinth of sounds and smells, misdirection and misfortune. A labyrinth with no exit, a maze with no prize. You don't even realize that you are trapped. Your lust for blood has driven you in endless circles, chasing the cries of children in some unseen chamber, always seeming so near, yet somehow out of reach, but you will never find them. None of you will. This is where your story ends. And to you, my brave volunteer, who somehow found this job listing not intended for you, although there was a way out planned for you, I have a feeling that's not what you want. I have a feeling that you are right where you want to be. I am remaining as well. I am nearby. This place will not be remembered, and the memory of everything that started this can finally begin to fade away. As the agony of every tragedy should. And to you monsters trapped in the corridors, be still and give up your spirits. They don't belong to you. For most of you, I believe there is peace and perhaps more waiting for you after the smoke clears. Although, for one of you, the darkest pit of Hell has opened to swallow you whole, so don't keep the devil waiting, old friend. My daughter, if you can hear me, I knew you would return as well. It's in your nature to protect the innocent. I'm sorry that on that day, the day you were shut out and left to die, no one was there to lift you up into their arms the way you lifted others into yours, and then, what became of you. I should have known you wouldn't be content to disappear, not my daughter. I couldn't save you then, so let me save you now. It's time to rest - for you, and for those you have carried in your arms. This ends for all of us.
Buen juego recomendado 10 de 10

game was good at 1st but over time the devs ruined the game im always redownloading because i love the game then im always uninstalling due to the obnoxious gameplay that is continued to be allowed. throw a pallet dont throw a pallet hit if you do hit if you dont. hit through walls and the absolute best part is after you run the killer around while 3 gens get done if you get hooked once youre going to get tunneled and camped because there is no penalty for this other than the other survivors realizing hes camping and doing gens how ever this never gets done if you play solo so you will just always get tunneled and camped rank 20-1 doesnt matter. killers benefit the most by camping the hook which means that you sit in a 3-5min que just to die after 1 hook. if you play this game only play killer its the only enjoyable part of this game. the killers are so op you dont have to camp but its a 4k every game if you do and most points. best part is theres no punishment for the killer just chillin by ppl dying so its pretty easy for everyone to play like that and maximize points.
